title: Valles Caldera National Preserve: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       The preserve is always open and may be visited any time of year.   Valle Grande Visitor Center     Summer (May 15 to October 31); daily; 8 AM to 8 PM    Winter (November 1 to May 14) daily; 9 AM to 5 PM (closed Thanksgiving and Christmas)     Located two miles from main entrance off Hwy. 4 at mile marker 39.2    Directions
